steps.title: üéØ This Isn't Just a Resume - It's Resume Intelligence
steps.text:
Welcome! What you're looking at isn't a static document - it's an intelligent resume optimization system built by an engineering leader with 15+ years of experience.

This tool uses priority-based content curation, intelligent filtering algorithms, and dynamic preset configurations to automatically optimize resume content for different roles and situations.

Think of it as having a career strategist, technical writer, and design expert working together to present the most relevant version of this professional background for any opportunity.

Let me show you how sophisticated resume optimization actually works...

steps.title: üìã Watch Intelligent Content Adaptation
steps.text:
Here's where the magic happens. Each preset isn't just a different layout - it's a completely different strategic presentation of the same professional data.

Right now you're seeing: The comprehensive view with 14+ sections and full detail

Watch this transformation: I'm going to switch to the 'Senior Engineering Leadership' preset. Notice how the system automatically:
‚Ä¢ Emphasizes management and team-building achievements
‚Ä¢ Prioritizes strategic technical decisions over implementation details
‚Ä¢ Surfaces cross-functional collaboration and business impact
‚Ä¢ Reorganizes content based on leadership-specific priority rankings

This isn't just hiding/showing sections - it's intelligent content curation where every bullet point has been ranked for relevance to different career paths.

Go ahead, try switching between 'Comprehensive' and 'Senior Engineering Leadership' to see the same professional background optimized for completely different audiences.

steps.title: üéõÔ∏è Master the Optimization Controls
steps.text:
Now here's where this becomes truly powerful - you have granular control over the optimization engine.

Content Density Slider: This isn't just 'show more/less' - it's priority-threshold filtering. Every bullet point in this resume has been assigned a strategic priority score (1-10) based on:
‚Ä¢ Universal appeal across industries
‚Ä¢ Technical sophistication level
‚Ä¢ Business impact and leadership scope
‚Ä¢ Innovation and award recognition

Watch what happens: Move the slider from 100% to 50%. The system keeps only the highest-priority content - the stuff that impresses CTOs, hiring managers, and technical leaders regardless of specific role requirements.

Section Controls: Want to craft a story for a specific opportunity? Toggle entire sections on/off. The priority filtering still applies within your selected sections.

The Result: Instead of a generic resume, you get strategically curated content that maximizes impact while staying relevant to your target role.

Try adjusting the density slider now - watch how the content intelligently adapts!

steps.title: üìÑ Get Interview-Ready Results
steps.text:
Here's the final piece of the sophistication: professional PDF generation that maintains your optimization choices.

What makes this special:
‚Ä¢ Theme-Aware Generation: The PDF automatically inherits your selected UI theme colors for visual cohesion
‚Ä¢ Cloud Infrastructure: Generated using enterprise-grade Gotenberg service on Google Cloud Run
‚Ä¢ Pixel-Perfect Quality: Browser-quality rendering with modern CSS Grid layouts
‚Ä¢ Smart Filename: Auto-generates professional filenames like 'joe-sangiorgio-senior-leadership-2025.pdf'

The Result: You get a resume that doesn't just look professional - it demonstrates that you understand and use sophisticated technical tools.

The PDF you download represents hours of strategic thinking about content priority, audience targeting, and professional presentation - all automated through intelligent systems.

This isn't just a resume generator - it's a demonstration of how technology can solve complex professional challenges.
